column4: i could do with some wireless help too, please :) Be warned - i have a dlink dwl-520+ with the notorious acx100 chip. I got it to connect to my router (FON) when unencrypted, but now, using WEP, i'm out of luck :(
don't use WEP if you're concerned about privacy -- use WPA or run ssh over unencrypted.
i'd love to, but i can't even get wep to work! Is wpa any easier to configure?
generally not, no, unless you can get it going with network-manager-gnome
